DOC.brief_summary: This is the first time that NSA-789, a new compound being developed for schizophrenia, will be given to humans. Each healthy subject will receive a single dose, except for 8 subjects who will receive 2 doses-- one dose under fasting conditions and one dose after eating food.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Tolerability of NSA-789
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Healthy men and women between 18 and 50 years old. Women must be of nonchildbearing potential (not able to have children). Must be of normal body weight.
